data.text: Me ba, sɛ wutie me nsɛm,
sɛ wowɛn wʼaso ma nyansa
na woma wo nne so frɛ nhumu
na sɛ wohwehwɛ no te sɛnea wohwehwɛ dwetɛ
ɛno na wobɛte Awurade suro ase
Awurade ma nimdeɛ,
Ɔkora nkonimdi ma wɔn a wɔteɛ,
ɔwɛn nea ɔyɛ pɛ kwan,
Ɛno na wobɛte nea eye ne nea ɛyɛ pɛ,
Afei nyansa bewura wo koma mu,
Adwene bɛbɔ wo ho ban
Nyansa beyi wo afi amumɔyɛfo akwan mu,
wɔn a wɔaman afi akwan pa so
wɔn a wɔn ani gye bɔneyɛ ho,
wɔn a wɔn akwan yɛ kɔntɔnkye
Nimdeɛ begye wo afi ɔbea waresɛefo no nsam,
nea wagyaa ne mmabaabere mu kunu
Ne fi yɛ ɔkwan a ɛkɔ owu mu
Obiara a ɔkɔ ne nkyɛn no nsan mma
Enti wubedi nnipa pa anammɔn akyi
Efisɛ wɔn a wɔteɛ bɛtena asase no so,
na wobetwa amumɔyɛfo afi asase no so,
